sections.title: Currently Learning

sections.title: Academic Focus
sections.content: Completing my CS Master's thesis on distributed systems and real-time data processing. Expected completion: June 2026.

sections.title: Reading

sections.content: Contributing to open-source projects and building small web tools that solve everyday problems I encounter.
